<h3 id="X38118">X(38118) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(3), X(6), X(10)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a^6+(b+c)*a^5-(5*b^2+2*b*c+5*c^2)*a^4+2*b*c*(b+c)*a^3-2*b*c*(b^2+6*b*c+c^2)*a^2-(b^4-c^4)*(b-c)*a+(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38118) = X(6)+2*X(6684) = X(10)+2*X(182) = X(40)+5*X(3618) = X(69)-7*X(31423) = X(355)+5*X(12017) = X(551)-4*X(10168) = 5*X(631)+X(3751) = X(946)-4*X(3589) = X(1352)-4*X(3634) = 2*X(1386)+X(11362) = 5*X(1698)+X(6776) = X(3313)+2*X(31760) = 3*X(5085)+X(38144) = X(38029)-3*X(38064) = 2*X(38040)-3*X(38049) = X(38040)-3*X(38110) = 3*X(38047)-X(38144) = 3*X(38064)+X(38116) = 3*X(38089)-X(38146) = 3*X(38089)-2*X(38167)</b>
<p>X(38118) lies on these lines: {6,6684}, {10,182}, {30,38089}, {40,3618}, {69,31423}, {165,14853}, {355,12017}, {511,10164}, {515,5085}, {516,14561}, {517,38040}, {518,10165}, {519,38029}, {524,38068}, {551,10168}, {611,3911}, {631,3751}, {758,38120}, {946,3589}, {952,38191}, {971,38194}, {1210,2330}, {1352,3634}, {1386,11362}, {1428,31397}, {1503,10175}, {1692,31398}, {1698,6776}, {2802,38119}, {3313,31760}, {3564,11231}, {3579,18583}, {3828,11179}, {3844,8550}, {4297,5092}, {5050,5847}, {5480,31730}, {5493,25555}, {5587,25406}, {5657,16475}, {5762,38187}, {5840,38197}, {5845,38123}, {5846,38127}, {5848,38133}, {5849,38134}, {5850,38115}, {5921,19877}, {6211,17023}, {10172,10516}, {10202,34378}, {11180,19876}, {11645,38076}, {12512,31670}, {13883,19146}, {13936,19145}, {14927,18492}, {17355,24257}, {21850,31663}, {28146,38136}, {28194,38035}, {28198,38079}, {28204,38165}</p>
<p>
X(38118) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {165, 14853}, {5050, 26446}, {5085, 38047}, {5587, 25406}, {5657, 16475}, {38029, 38116}<br>
X(38118) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (10516, 10172), (38049, 38110), (38146, 38167)<br>
X(38118) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (13912, 13975, 31396), (38064, 38116, 38029), (38089, 38146, 38167)<br>
</p>
